DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether sublingual buprenorphine is effective in the treatment of acute pain in adult patients with extremity bone fractures
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy of Buprenorphine for Treatment of Acute Pain
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of extremity bone fracture Age>16 years Acute pain of score 3 or greater on numerical rating scale Long term use of opium or opioids/dependence Previous administration of analgesic Known sensitivity to opioids Pregnant women History of medical problems (liver, kidney, heart, hematologic)
